i=f("style"),i.type="text/css",i.id="s"+c,(p.fake?p:d).appendChild(i),p.appendChild(d),i.styleSheet?i.styleSheet.cssText=e:i.appendChild(n.createTextNode(e)),d.id=c,p.fake&&(p.style.background="",p.style.overflow="hidden",u=S.style.overflow,S.style.overflow="hidden",S.appendChild(p)),s=t(d,e),p.fake?(p.parentNode.removeChild(p),S.style.overflow=u,S.offsetHeight):d.parentNode.removeChild(d),!!s}function i=[];o--;)i.push("("+u(n[o])+":"+r+")");return i=i.join(" or "),c("@supports ("+i+") { #modernizr { position: absolute; } }",function(e){return"absolute"==getComputedStyle(e,null).position})}return t}function v(e,n){return function(){return e.apply(n,arguments)}}function m(e,n,t){var o;for(var i in e)if(e[i]in n)return t===!1?e[i]:(o=n[e[i]],r(o,"function")?v(o,t||n):o);return!1}function h(e,n,o,i){function s(){l&&(delete O.style,delete O.modElem)}if(i=r(i,"undefined")?!1:i,!r(o,"undefined")){var u=p(e,o);if(!r(u,"undefined"))return u}for(var l,c,v,m,h,g=["modernizr","tspan","samp"];!O.style&&g.length;)l=!0,O.modElem=f(g.shift()),O.style=O.modElem.style;for(v=e.length,c=0;v>c;c++)if(m=e[c],h=O.style[m],d(m,"-")&&(m=a(m)),O.style[m]!==t){if(i||r(o,"undefined"))return s(),"pfx"==n?m:!0;try{O.style[m]=o}catch(y){}if(O.style[m]!=h)return s(),"pfx"==n?m:!0}return s(),!1}function g(e,n,t,o,i){var s=e.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+e.slice(1),a=(e+" "+j.join(s+" ")+s).split(" ");return r(n,"string")||r(n,"undefined")?h(a,n,o,i):(a=(e+" "+P.join(s+" ")+s).split(" "),m(a,n,t))}var y=[],_=[],C={_version:"3.3.1",_config:{classPrefix:"",enableClasses:!0,enableJSClass:!0,usePrefixes:!0},_q:[],on:function(e,n){var t=this;setTimeout(function(){n(t[e])},0)},addTest:function(e,n,t){_.push({name:e,fn:n,options:t})},addAsyncTest:function(e){_.push({name:null,fn:e})}},Modernizr=function(){};Modernizr.prototype=C,Modernizr=new Modernizr;var w,S=n.documentElement,b="svg"===S.nodeName.toLowerCase();!function(){var e={}.hasOwnProperty;w=r(e,"undefined")||r(e.call,"undefined")?function(e,n){return n in e&&r(e.constructor.prototype[n],"undefined")}:function(n,t){return e.call(n,t)}}(),C._l={},C.on=function(e,n){this._l[e]||(this._l[e]=[]),this._l[e].push(n),Modernizr.hasOwnProperty(e)&&setTimeout(function(){Modernizr._trigger(e,Modernizr[e])},0)},C._trigger=function(e,n){if(this._l[e]){var t=this._l[e];setTimeout(function(){var e,r;for(e=0;e<t.length;e++)(r=t[e])(n)},0),delete this._l[e]}},Modernizr._q.push(function(){C.addTest=s});var x=C._config.usePrefixes?" -webkit- -moz- -o- -ms- { position: absolute; } }",function(n){t="absolute"==(e.getComputedStyle?e.getComputedStyle(n,null):n.currentStyle).position}),t}}();C.mq=T;var E=C.testStyles=c;Modernizr.addTest("touchevents",function(){var t;if("ontouchstart"in e||e.DocumentTouch&&n instanceof DocumentTouch)t=!0;else{var r=["@media (",x.join("touch-enabled),("),"heartz",")","{#modernizr{top:9px;position:absolute}}"].join("");E(r,function(e){t=9===e.offsetTop})}return t});var z="Moz O ms r,o=x.length,i=e.CSSRule;if("undefined"==typeof i)return t;if(!n)return!1;if(n=n.replace(/^@/,""),r=n.replace(/-/g,"_").toUpperCase()+"_RULE",r in i)return"@"+n;for(var s=0;o>s;s++){var a=x[s],u=a.toUpperCase()+"_"+r;if(u in i)return"@-"+a.toLowerCase()+"-"+n}return!1};C.atRule=N;var A=function(){function e(e,n){var o;return e?(n&&"string"!=typeof n||(n=f(n||"div")),e="on"+e,o=e in n,!o&&r&&(n.setAttribute||(n=f("div")),n.setAttribute(e,""),o="function"==typeof n[e],n[e]!==t&&(n[e]=t),n.removeAttribute(e)),o):!1}var r=!("onblur"in n.documentElement);return e}();C.hasEvent=A,Modernizr.addTest("pointerevents",function(){var e=!1,n=P.length;for(e=Modernizr.hasEvent("pointerdown");n--&&!e;)A(P[n]+"pointerdown")&&(e=!0);return e});var L={elem:f("modernizr")};Modernizr._q.push(function(){delete L.elem});var O={style:L.elem.style};Modernizr._q.unshift(function(){delete O.style}),C.testAllProps=g;var k=C.prefixed=function(e,n,t){return 0===e.indexOf("@")?N(e):(-1!=e.indexOf("-")&&(e=a(e)),n?g(e,n,t):g(e,"pfx"))};C.prefixedCSS=function(e){var n=k(e);return n&&u(n)};o(),i(y),delete C.addTest,delete !function(e){var n=navigator.userAgent,i=/Mobile|iP(hone|od|ad)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Kindle|NetFront|Silk-Accelerated|(hpw|web)OS|Fennec|Minimo|Opera M(obi|ini)|Blazer|Dolfin|Dolphin|Skyfire|Zune/gi;e&&e.addTest&&(e.addTest("mobile",function(){return i.test(n)&&e.mq("only screen and (min-width: 320px) and (max-width: 639px)")}),e.addTest("tablet",function(){return i.test(n)&&!e.mobile}))}(Modernizr);
  </script>
 </head>

             What Happens When You Overrev Your Engine
            </a>

         <div class="custom-item why-did-uss-thresher-submarine-sink-declassified-documents column-stacked">
          <div class="custom-item-inner">
           <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Incoming" data-vars-position="4" href="/military/navy-ships/a35854139/why-did-uss-thresher-submarine-sink-declassified-documents/">
            <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/nuclear-powered-submarine-the-uss-thresher-steers-through-news-photo-1615916062.?crop=0.784xw:1.00xh;0.109xw,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
            </span>
            <img alt="'uss thresher' on course" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/nuclear-powered-submarine-the-uss-thresher-steers-through-news-photo-1615916062.?crop=0.784xw:1.00xh;0.109xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/nuclear-powered-submarine-the-uss-thresher-steers-through-news-photo-1615916062.?crop=0.784xw:1.00xh;0.109xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/nuclear-powered-submarine-the-uss-thresher-steers-through-news-photo-1615916062.?crop=0.784xw:1.00xh;0.109xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/nuclear-powered-submarine-the-uss-thresher-steers-through-news-photo-1615916062.?crop=0.784xw:1.00xh;0.109xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/nuclear-powered-submarine-the-uss-thresher-steers-through-news-photo-1615916062.?crop=0.784xw:1.00xh;0.109xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="'USS Thresher' On Course"/>
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-content">
            <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Incoming" data-vars-position="4" href="/military/navy-ships/a35854139/why-did-uss-thresher-submarine-sink-declassified-documents/">
             New Documents Reveal Why the USS Thresher Sunk
            </a>
            <span class="custom-item-meta">
             <!-- shared/byline -->
             <div class="byline custom-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
              By
              <span class="byline-name" itemprop="name" rel="author">
               Kyle Mizokami
              </span>
             </div>
             <!-- / shared/byline -->
            </span>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="custom-item best-smokeless-fire-pits column-stacked">
          <div class="custom-item-inner">
           <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Incoming" data-vars-position="5" href="/home/g35797153/best-smokeless-fire-pits/">
            <img alt="best smokeless fire pits" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pop-smokeless-fire-pits-b-1615824756.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pop-smokeless-fire-pits-b-1615824756.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pop-smokeless-fire-pits-b-1615824756.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pop-smokeless-fire-pits-b-1615824756.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pop-smokeless-fire-pits-b-1615824756.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-content">
            <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Incoming" data-vars-position="5" href="/home/g35797153/best-smokeless-fire-pits/">
             8 Smokeless Fire Pits for Backyard Bonfires
            </a>
            <span class="custom-item-meta">
             <!-- shared/byline -->
             <div class="byline custom-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">

              <span class="byline-name" itemprop="name" rel="author">

        <div class="custom-item-inner">
         <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-2x1" data-vars-cta="Must Read" data-vars-position="1" href="/space/rockets/a35851535/robert-goddard-rocket-history/">

           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="sponsor-bar-placeholder">
          </div>
          <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Must Read" data-vars-position="1" href="/space/rockets/a35851535/robert-goddard-rocket-history/">
           Shooting at the Moon: The Pioneering Rocketry of Robert Goddard
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
           In 1929, Popular Mechanics covered the explosive work of Robert Goddard. His liquid propellant-fueled rocket, the first of its kind, ca
          </div>
          <span class="custom-item-meta">
           <!-- shared/byline -->
           <div class="byline custom-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
            By
            <span class="byline-name" itemprop="name" rel="author">
             John Brady
            </span>
           </div>
           <!-- / shared/byline -->
          </span>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="feed-block-container block-style- block-layout-image-stacked">

             <span class="byline-name" itemprop="name" rel="author">
              Alex Hollings
             </span>
            </div>
            <!-- / shared/byline -->
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="feed-block-container block-style- block-layout-video">
     <div class="feed-block feed-block-big-story" data-block-template="big-story">
      <div class="feed-block-header">
       <h2 class="feed-block-heading">
        <span>
         Must Watch
        </span>
       </h2>
      </div>
      <div class="feed-block-content" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="b1c7bcb5-4025-4d41-9336-da797b19feba" data-vars-block-slot="7" data-vars-block-type="Big Story Block">
       <div class="custom-item made-here-handcrafted-meier-skis text-under">
        <div class="custom-item-inner">
         <div class="feed-lede-video standard-lede-video internal-video custom-promo-video custom-item-video">
          <div class="embed-wrapper iframe-wrapper">
           <div class="glimmerPlayer media-loader lazyload" data-align="" data-autoplay="true" data-dock="false" data-media-id="" data-muted="true" data-player-id="05f463a2-92cf-4f52-95c6-dff1ff828661" data-position="17" data-sharing="false" data-size="" data-sticky="null" data-sticky-container="">
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="custom-item-content">
          <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Must Watch" data-vars-position="1" href="/adventure/outdoor-gear/a35408658/made-here-handcrafted-meier-skis/">
           See the Intricate Craft That Goes Into Handmade, Eco-Friendly Skis
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
           <p>
            All that extra TLC leads to a better shred.
           </p>
          </div>
          <span class="custom-item-meta">
           <!-- shared/byline -->

          <div class="custom-item-inner">
           <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Military" data-vars-position="3" href="/military/navy-ships/a35338704/marines-long-range-unmanned-surface-vehicle/">

            <img alt="best solar chargers" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pop-solar-chargers-b-1616079318.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pop-solar-chargers-b-1616079318.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pop-solar-chargers-b-1616079318.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pop-solar-chargers-b-1616079318.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pop-solar-chargers-b-1616079318.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-content">
            <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Tech" data-vars-position="5" href="/adventure/outdoor-gear/a33022426/best-solar-chargers/">
             Power Up Anywhere With These Solar Chargers
            </a>
            <span class="custom-item-meta">
             <!-- shared/byline -->
             <div class="byline custom-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
              By
              <span class="byline-name" itemprop="name" rel="author">
               Adrienne Donica
              </span>
             </div>
             <!-- / shared/byline -->

        <div class="custom-item best-tools-2021">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="The Latest" data-vars-position="10" href="/home/tools/a35701195/best-tools-2021/">
           <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pop-tools-lede-fin-1616080575.gif?crop=0.565xw:1.00xh;0.122xw,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
           </span>
           <img alt="tool awards 2021" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pop-tools-lede-fin-1616080575.gif?crop=0.565xw:1.00xh;0.122xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pop-tools-lede-fin-1616080575.gif?crop=0.565xw:1.00xh;0.122xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pop-tools-lede-fin-1616080575.gif?crop=0.565xw:1.00xh;0.122xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pop-tools-lede-fin-1616080575.gif?crop=0.565xw:1.00xh;0.122xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pop-tools-lede-fin-1616080575.gif?crop=0.565xw:1.00xh;0.122xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
